text:
Bhatia bhai. You are the most welcoming people, I've ever met. I remember that the first time I met you with I ended up speaking with you for 6 hours. The next three years were filled with many such instances of me walking to your room and then us roaming the path between our wings. I have always felt better after talking to you. You never failed to cheer me up however bad the situation might have been, however sad you yourself would have been. Never would have survived CSE without youğŸ˜…

 Thanks for being a great friend. I hope to see you soon. Best of luck
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: Pakibro! Bahut naam butcher kiya Tera. Par tune bhi kam maje nhi liye;). Yaad hai jabh uthane ke liye ncc ka juta maara tha:)). Aaj tak dard deta hai. I'm really in awe ki tune itni jldi, itna mast dance kaise sikh liya. Bas nha liya kar bhai. Best of luck
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: 3 saal pakane ke liye sorry bhai. Bahut maza aaya tere saath Hamesha. Usske liye thanks.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: You are the weirdest badass ever. Half of what I've watched on Netflix is stuff that I first saw you making memes on. Best of luck buddy.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text:
Bhai tere mail id mein 2004 kyu aata hai.  Anyways, Sanghi bhai. Tere chakkar mein bahut sidiya chadi hai bhaiğŸ˜…. But worth it for your company. Tu literally mera academic mentor raha hai. Mein chein ki nind sota tha yeh sochke ki assignment to sanghi kara hi dega. 

But sabh se zyada important tune mera perspective badla tha padhai ke baare mein. You had a huge hand in making be process oriented rather than goal oriented making my journey much more enjoyable. (Feel free to construct double meaning about the previous sentenceğŸ¤£). 

Pehli job gurgaon mein lagi hai. Ghar zarur aana. See you soon bhai.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text:
Before starting to write memoirs, I made a list of people by how I knew them, clubs, department, social circles, etc. You were on every single one of those lists. 

You have done the fastest 180 I've ever seen. The first time I worked with you on any assignment, we were taking a break in the dosa canteen. You said and I quote "bhai abhi itna kucch padhna hai, pata hai Fermat's last theorem ka proof 129 pages ka hai, abh nhi padhenge to kabh" ğŸ˜…. Exactly one year after that, "bhai os ka assignment karwaane aajao", and then leaving saying "abe jitne ho ske krdena, mein khane ja rha" and coming back after I submitted it. 

I've always loved your impeccable sense of hunour, timing and an extremely course social filter. I remember you saying to Mainak sir during CS220 endsem paper distribution, while he was writing the course averages, highest, etc. in the most confident voice ever, "Sir I urge you to write in hexadecimal", ğŸ˜‚providing much needed comical reprieve to everyone.

 I have enjoyed witty wordplay and weirdly inappropriate yet funny mom jokes many times, even though I have been on the receiving end more often than I would have liked. ğŸ˜…

I have had a lot of fun, working with you on every group assignment we have done(even if you did not workğŸ˜‹). I enjoyed our after assignment submission parties in UC/Dominos/Hall 1 canteen/Chickblast even more. Loved debating with you on the same team, whenever I got the opportunity to do so. 

You have been with me when I did all stupid stuff for the first time, alcohol, w***, taking VR prematurelyğŸ˜…. 

I am sure that you have given much more back to people at IITK, than you have received. Love you brother. Keep in touch. No excuses, you will be in Gurgaon as well.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: Bhai, you are the embodiment of kaam karo fal ki chinta mat kro. Really happy to see your achievements. Great focus and dedication. Also cp tips ke liye call krunga utha lenağŸ˜…

text: Hey Avik. You are the most dedicated and hardworking person I've ever known. Had a great time talking to you in the mess. Congrats and best of luck!

text: Hey man thanks for all the lovely conversations in KD/RM. ğŸ˜€ Lucky to have known you. See you around and best of luckğŸ€.

author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text:
Hey buddy. You are very humble and helping. I probably owe meeting a lot of deadlines to youğŸ˜…. Also thanks for never shooting down any discussion I wished to have with you regarding any minute technical detail in any course which no one else gave a fuck about(remember 698xğŸ¤£) 

 I always wished to emulate your dedication. I remember struggling with a homework in kd at 2 in the morning, feeling frustrated and tired. But you were sitting in the opposite corner, and seeing you made me push on. 

I did not know you liked cricket as well. Otherwise I probably wouldn't have discussed as much academics with you as I did ğŸ˜…. 

Wish you success in whatever you decide to do. Keep in touch.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: Bhai teri shaayari kabhi nhi bhulunga. Aapki sexologist banne ki yaatra mein khub shubhkamnaayein.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: Bhai tumse baat krke hamesha bahut maza aaya. Hope to make many more memories in the final year.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text:
Sorry bhai tera memoir likhne mein itni der kardi. I've realised ki tere saath itni memories ki select karna impossible hai. 

Apni banni pehli baar 2nd year mein start hui thi, aur kabhi band nhi huiğŸ˜…. Tere saath kabhi bhi kaam kro toh maza bahut aata hai kyunki tu hamesha khush aur positive rehta hai. OS ki deadline se pehle aag waali patang udane jaata hai. Parallel ke assignment krte same, Reliance colony aur kota ke kissey sunata hai. Pata hai nhi hoga kuchh, toh bhi bolega tension mat le ho jayegağŸ˜ƒ. 

Tu had se zyada humble aur self aware hai. Aman ko bolo teri height kam hai to jawab milega, "ğŸ˜¡Almost same to hai", Tujhe bolo ki bowling thodi dhire hai, jawab milega "ğŸ˜•Haan yaar spin zyada tez hai". But trust me, you are very smart and talented, never sell yourself short. 

Aage se mein bolunga Sanghi, Singhal pehle Param ko lenge, woh nhi maana, toh kisi AUR mast bande ko le lenge. (Samajhne waale samajh gye) ğŸ˜‰. 

Love you brother. Milte rehna, aur apni show recommendations jaari rkhna.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: Hey buddy, can never forget bitching about outdated curriculum and pointless evaluation schemes with youğŸ˜…. You are hands down, one of the smartest people I met here. See you soon!
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: Sometimes I used to open WhatsApp just to see your stories ğŸ˜…. Thanks for all the discussions we had. Stay happy ğŸ˜ and keep in touch
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text:
Bhai itna generous kaise hai tu? Daaru, g****, dawai, toothpaste, ghar se laye hue snacks, har chiz dene ke liye taiyaar rehta tha tu(nhi bhi rehta tha toh le hi lete the ;).) 
But most importantly teri company best chiz thi. Jabh bhi koi vacation mein campus mein hota tha, Tu bhi saath hi hota tha. Kabhi bhi pareshan hota tha toh tere se baat kar leta tha. Love you bro! Hope to see you soon again.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: Chappal churane se tumhari nhi ho jaati. Sorry 8th sem mein nhi mil paya. 9th aur 10th mein kaafi maze karenge bhai. ğŸ˜€

text: Arre sharma. Uth jaa!! Yeh line lecture jaane se pehle itni boli aur suni hai kya batau. Bahut mast aadmi hai tu bhai. See you soon. Bhabhi man saman ğŸ™.

text:
Ratnesh bhai. First year se lekar third year mein sabh tere saath kiya bhai. Robot banana, Dynamics padhna, Gadde uthana. Agar Tu subha uthaane ke liye na hota mere 2-3 exam toh aise hi 0 jaate. 
Bahut generous aadmi hai tu. Itna mast kaam kiya tune raktarpan mein. Congratulations bro! Tere jitna kaam krne ke liye khatarnak time management chahiye bhai. 
 Tere bina honestly mere liye IITK incomplete hai. Hope to see you this year bhai. Best of luck. Call krte rehna
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text: Kaafi mazedar banda hai tu. Sorry kabhi kabhi na bani ho tohğŸ˜”. Waise first year mein aur tt ğŸ“practice krte toh inter IIT khel jateğŸ˜…. See you soon buddy.

text:
Yo Sahila. You're one of the best and most positive people I've come across in my life. I owe you for every assignment you have helped me solve, every exam you have "collaborated" with me on. You have woken me up and taught me syllabus at the last moment. It's almost as if you were my mother:). 

Had a lot fun in resident evil. No, I was 
 the one outside you're window. If you come know who it was, let me know too. 

I regret not being able meet you in the last semester. Will make up for it soon. And I will bowl you out this time. Hope you find a real Rosa Thompson soon;)
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text:
Hey Jagga. Tera iconic move hamesha yaad rhega - right hand ki thumb aur index finger se chashma set krnağŸ˜…. 

Tere aur Baheti ke saath, usske whiteboard pe sawal banane mein bahut maza aata tha. Par tune usske baad wing kyu badal liyağŸ˜¤?

Anyways always loved your one liners and sarcastic remarks. Like a true computer scientist you optimized humor w.r.t words spoken. 

Keep in touch buddy. Best of luck.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani

text:
Asati bhai. Tujhse acchi advice kahi nhi mili. Bahut mature aadmi hai tu. Ta 202 mein support ke liye thanks. Tere saath jivan ka aur jain samaj ka kaafi gyan mila hai
Nha liya kar bas

text:
Mandatory quantum joke: untill you enter kd, Snehal is simultaneously in his favorite seat in the kd lab or sleeping in his room to wake up for repeating the grind soon. 

I can never forget our chai pe charcha's in the cc canteen, and specifically, our discussion about is quantum has a better future than classical fields. Though with you in it I put my money on quantum. 

Thanks for all your help in courses. Let's watch a match at Lord's soon. Even an ODI is fine is a test is too long for your busy assğŸ˜…. 
Best of luck.
author: Baldip Singh Bijlani
